name: Blood Diamond
summery: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
summery: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Godfather
summery: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

name: The Dark Knight
summery: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: Schindler's List
summery: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: Pulp Fiction
summery: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summery: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Fight Club
summery: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

name: Seven
summery: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: City of God
summery: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
